column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Service was nice and polite
column2: and the look of Lou Malnati's is clean and on the hip side. It was very crowded every time I passed by
column3: which made me think twice - as I noticed there was also a long line for the Grand Luxe
column4: Starbucks and Chipotle - that's gotta tell you somethin'
